docs.title: MoBrix-backend
docs.text: An intuitive Express.js wrapper, to easily build an expressjs backend with a single configuration file

docs.title: Summary
docs.text:
• Getting started
  • Installation
  • Tests
  • Authors
  • License

Check out the official MoBrix-backend guide page for more details

docs.title: Installation
docs.text:
If you want to use this library inside your project, just install it:


npm i mobrix-backend

docs.title: Tests
docs.text:
Unit tests are located inside tests folder. The test script is executed with pre-defined test command:

npm run test
